title: Correction to: Trans-species microRNA loci in the parasitic plant Cuscuta campestris have a U6-like snRNA promoter
content: This is a correction to: Collin Hudzik, Sean Maguire, Shengxi Guan, Jeremy Held, Michael J Axtell, Trans-species microRNA loci in the parasitic plant Cuscuta campestris have a U6-like snRNA promoter, The Plant Cell, Volume 35, Issue 6, June 2023, Pages 1834â€“1847, https://doi.org/10.1093/plcell/koad076
